subject: Re: [junit] Getting started with Junit
msgSnippet: Setup: I have taken care of the following: 1) I have Java path setup correctly and I have junit installed and I am able to run the swingui.TestRunner and I
messageBody:
Setup: I have taken care of the following:

1) I have Java path setup correctly and I have junit installed and I am able to
run the swingui.TestRunner and I executed several sample tests comes with
junit tool. "Green bar" no problem.

I am trying to do the following:

2) I trying to run the following code which give me error and i don't know why:

Trying to run : C:\junitbook\jumpstart> java -cp .;..\..\junit3.8.1\junit.jar junit.swingui.TestRunner TestCalculator (Hit -Enter)

Action Happens: When I hit enter it launches Juit Swing Test Runner which has
"Red" line and have following error message:

Under Result Window:
Warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1) No tests found in TestCalculator
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in TestCalculator

Please Note: I have TestCalculator.class available under c:\junitbook\jumpstart folder.
*"This is the first time I ran a junit test".

Please let me know what i am doing wrong and if there is a better way to resolve this
issue.

Thanks;

Sal





Robert Wenner <robert.wenner@...> wrote:
> Please help me with the best process to setup Junit and start writing
> test cases.

What problems did you encounter which where not covered in the
documentation that ships with JUnit?

Robert
